TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ChartGroup

Docs.summary: Represents one or more series plotted in a chart with the same format.

remarks.para: A chart contains one or more chart groups, each chart group contains one or more objects, and each series contains one or more objects. For example, a single chart might contain both a line chart group, containing all the series plotted with the line chart format, and a bar chart group, containing all the series plotted with the bar chart format. The ChartGroup object is a member of the collection.
Use ChartGroups(), where is the chart group index number, to return a single ChartGroup object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application. When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object). Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisGroup AxisGroup { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisGroup get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisGroup value); };

Docs.summary: Returns the type of axis group. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BubbleScale { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the scale factor for bubbles in the specified chart group. Read/write.

remarks.para: This property can be set to an integer from 0 (zero) to 300, corresponding to a percentage of the default size.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object CategoryCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function CategoryCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

Docs.param: The index number in the visible category collection of the category to return.
Docs.summary: Returns all the visible categories in the chart group, or the specified visible category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a 32-bit Integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created. Read-only.

remarks.para: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD". This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DoughnutHoleSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the size of the hole in a doughnut chart group. The hole size is expressed as a percentage of the chart size, between 10 and 90 percent. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DownBars As DownBars

Docs.summary: Returns the down bars on a line chart. Applies only to line charts. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DropLines As DropLines

Docs.summary: Returns the drop lines for a series on a line chart or area chart. Applies only to line charts or area charts. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int FirstSliceAngle { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the angle of the first pie-chart or doughnut-chart slice, in degrees (clockwise from vertical). Applies only to pie, 3-D pie, and doughnut charts. Read/write.

remarks.para: Can be a value from 0 through 360.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object FullCategoryCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function FullCategoryCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

Docs.param: The index number in the full category collection of the category to return.
Docs.summary: Returns all the categories in the chart group, or the specified category, whether visible or filtered out.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int GapWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Bar and Column charts: Returns or sets the space between bar or column clusters, as a percentage of the bar or column width. Pie of Pie and Bar of Pie charts: Returns or sets the space between the primary and secondary sections of the chart. Read/write.

remarks.para: The value of this property must be between 0 and 500.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Has3DShading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value determining if a chart group has three-dimensional shading. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if chart group has three-dimensional shading, otherwise False.

remarks.para: Note: Setting Has3DShading = False has the effect of setting the chart material to "Flat", or removing the effect, whereas setting the Has3DShading = True sets the chart content to the default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasDropLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value stating if the chart has drop lines. Applies only to line and area charts. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if the line chart or area chart has drop lines; otherwise False

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasHiLoLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value stating if the chart has high-low lines. Applies only to line charts. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if the line chart has high-low lines; otherwise False

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasRadarAxisLabels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value stating if a radar chart has axis labels. Applies only to radar charts. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if a radar chart has axis labels; otherwise False

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasSeriesLines { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value stating if a stacked column chart or bar chart has series lines or if a Pie of Pie chart or Bar of Pie chart has connector lines between the two sections. Applies only to 2-D stacked bar, 2-D stacked column, pie of pie, or bar of pie charts. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to the values listed in the table below according to the conditions listed.DescriptionReturn ValueA Pie of Pie chart or Bar of Pie chart that has connector lines between the two sections.TrueA stacked column chart or bar chart that has series linesTrueOtherwiseFalse

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasUpDownBars { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value stating if a chart has up and down bars. Applies only to line charts. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if the line chart has up and down bars; otherwise False.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HiLoLines As HiLoLines

Docs.summary: Returns the high-low lines for a series on a line chart. Applies only to line charts. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the index number of the object within the collection of similar objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Overlap { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Specifies how bars and columns are positioned. Can be a value between – 100 and 100. Applies only to 2-D bar and 2-D column charts. Read/write.

remarks.para: If this property is set to – 100, bars are positioned so that there's one bar width between them. If the overlap is 0 (zero), there's no space between bars (one bar starts immediately after the preceding bar). If the overlap is 100, bars are positioned on top of each other.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the parent of the specified object. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RadarAxisLabels As TickLabels

Docs.summary: Returns the radar axis labels for the specified chart group. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SecondPlotSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the size of the secondary section of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart, as a percentage of the size of the primary pie. Read/write.

remarks.para: Can be a value from 5 to 200.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object SeriesCollection([in]object Index) runtime managed
Public Function SeriesCollection (Optional Index As Object) As Object

Docs.param: Optional Object The name or number of the series that you wish to have returned. If Index is not used, all the series in the chart group will be returned.
Docs.summary: Returns the requested series from within the chart group.
Docs.returns: An Object in the format, that represents all the requested series from the chart group

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SeriesLines As SeriesLines

Docs.summary: Returns the series lines for a 2-D stacked bar, 2-D stacked column, pie of pie, or bar of pie chart. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowNegativeBubbles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value that determines if negative bubbles are shown for the chart group. Valid only for bubble charts. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if negative bubbles are shown for the chart group, otherwise False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlSizeRepresents SizeRepresents { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlSizeRepresents get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlSizeRepresents value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets what the bubble size represents on a bubble chart. Read/write.
Docs.value: Can be either of the following constants: xlSizeIsArea or xlSizeIsWidth

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlChartSplitType SplitType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlChartSplitType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlChartSplitType value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the way the two sections of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart are split. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ SplitValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the threshold value separating the two sections of either a pie of pie chart or a bar of pie chart. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SubType { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Type { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpBars As UpBars
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::UpBars ^ UpBars { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::UpBars ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the up bars on a line chart. Applies only to line charts. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VaryByCategories { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Returns or sets the value stating if Microsoft Word assigns a different color or pattern to each data marker. The chart must contain only one series. Read/write.
Docs.value: A Boolean set to True if Microsoft Word assigns a different color or pattern to each data marker; otherwise False
